title: Collection lost after latest patch
body:
Hey guys,

I've sent off a ticket to Riot and reported a bug but I was just wondering if anyone else has had this same issue. So I logged in today and went through a League update and then once I logged in all of my Champions and Skins were gone. Re-patched the client to be safe but no change there, launched a practice game but can't select anything at Champion Select as I have nothing unlocked apparently. Also account level is 31, not only that but there are no free champions available to choose either. This just a me thing or are there others having fun with this too?

Regards,
CaptainCon

replies.body: have the same issues too, all my champions and skins have been wiped.
So it is more than a single user, meaning it's probably going to be multiple more so hopefully Riot jumps on it fast.
